item.title: Template for Sortable Tables released
item.description: SobiSort is a SobiPro template which allows you to easily create a products directory which lists the items in a sortable table. It should give an idea what can be made with SobiPro.
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Profile Field updated
item.description:
New version of Profile Field for SobiPro available for download and in Sigsiu.NET Repository.

This is a bug fix release to solve a problem with the Contact Form field. Additionally this version has several new languages added.
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Japanese Language available
item.description:
Japanese Language Package for SobiPro is available to download and in Repository.
Now SobiPro can be used in 28 different languages!
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Vietnamese Language available
item.description:
Vietnamese Language Package for SobiPro is available to download and in Repository.
Now SobiPro can be used in 27 different languages!
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Language packages updated
item.description: We updated several language packages for SobiPro. Thanks to our Translation Teams.
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Ukrainian Language available
item.description:
Ukrainian Language Package for SobiPro is available to download and in Repository.
Now SobiPro can be used in 26 different languages!
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Czech Language available
item.description:
Czech Language Package for SobiPro is available to download and in Repository.
Now SobiPro can be used in 25 different languages!
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Hungarian Language available
item.description:
Hungarian Language Package for SobiPro is available to download and in Repository.
Now SobiPro can be used in 24 different languages!
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: SobiPro 1.0.8 stable released
item.description:
We released SobiPro 1.0.8 stable today.
This is a maintenance release which solves a few problems.
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Contact Form Field released
item.description: The Contact Form Field for SobiPro is now available. Add a 'Contact Author', 'Claim Listing', 'Report Listing' or any other form to your entry's details view!
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)
